thread.title: Rihanna and Selena Gomez to Sing at 2015 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show
thread.title_full: Rihanna and Selena Gomez to Sing at 2015 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Rihanna and Selena Gomez to Sing at 2015 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show
text:
Comments RiRi and Selena Gomez are joined by another musical guest, The Weeknd, at the annual event in New York. 
The musical guests for the upcoming Victoria's Secret fashion show have been announced. Rihanna , Selena Gomez , and The Weeknd are scheduled to take the stage in New York at the annual event which will air on CBS December 8. Strutting their stuff on the runway will be VS Angels like Adriana Lima , Alessandra Ambrosio , Behati Prinsloo , Candice Swanepoel , and Lily Aldridge . They are joined by new additions such as Elsa Hosk, Jac Jagaciak, Jasmine Tookes, Kate Grigorieva, Lais Ribeiro, Martha Hunt, Romee Strijd, Sara Sampaio, Stella Maxwell, Taylor Hill and Victoria's Secret PINK model Rachel Hilbert. Last year, the show was made merry by Ariana Grande , Taylor Swift , Hozier , and Ed Sheeran . Other past performers included Jay-Z , Maroon 5 , Justin Bieber , and Nicki Minaj . RiRi also once sang at the event. Back in 2012, she delivered "Diamonds".
